| 年份  | 得主 | 国籍 | 贡献领域 | 颁奖词  | 图灵奖演讲稿  | 其他 |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ |
| 1966  | Alan Jay Perlis | 美国 | 编程语言 & 编译器| [For his influence in the area of advanced programming techniques and compiler construction.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/perlis_0132439.cfm)  | [The Synthesis of Algorithmic Systems](https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/321371.321372)  | 博士论文：On Integral Equations, Their Solution by Iteration and Analytic Continuation, 积分方程中的迭代和解析开拓解法 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Perlis |
| 1967  |  Maurice Vincent Wilkes | 英国 | 存储程序式计算机EDSAC，程序库 | [Professor Wilkes is best known as the builder and designer of the EDSAC, the first computer with an internally stored program. Built in 1949, the EDSAC used a mercury delay line memory. He is also known as the author, with Wheeler and Gill, of a volume on "Preparation of Programs for Electronic Digital Computers" in 1951, in which program libraries were effectively introduced.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/wilkes_1001395.cfm)  | [Computers Then and Now](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/228329.228342)   | 博士论文：The Propagation of Very Long Radio Waves in the Ionosphere, 关于甚长无线电波在电离层中的传播特性。 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Wilkes 曾开发过一种简单的表处理语言wisp |
|1968 | Richard Wesley Hamming | 美国 |数值方法，自动编码系统，错误检测和纠错码 |[For his work on numerical methods, automatic coding systems, and error-detecting and error-correcting codes.](https://amturing.acm.org/byyear.cfm) | [One Man’s View of Computer Science](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/321495.321497) |博士论文：Some Problems in the Boundary Value Theory of Linear Differential Equations, 关于线性微分方程边界值理论问题研究。他也是一位数学家。1945年参加曼哈顿计划，早期的研究支撑曼哈顿核弹引爆|
|1969| Marvin Lee Minsky | 美国 |人工智能| [For his central role in creating, shaping, promoting, and advancing the field of artificial intelligence.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/minsky_7440781.cfm) |[Form and Content in Computer Science](https://web.media.mit.edu/~minsky/papers/TuringLecture/TuringLecture.html)|博士论文：Theory of Neural Analog Reinforcement Systems and its Application to the Brain Model Problem |
|1970|James Hardy Wilkinson|英国|数值分析，线性代数，倒退错误分析|[For his research in numerical analysis to facilitate the use of the high-speed digital computer, having received special recognition for his work in computations in linear algebra and "backward" error analysis.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/wilkinson_0671216.cfm) |[Some Comments from a Numerical Analyst](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/321637.321638)| <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_H._Wilkinson> |
|1971|John McCarthy|美国|人工智能|[Dr. McCarthy's lecture "The Present State of Research on Artificial Intelligence" is a topic that covers the area in which he has achieved considerable recognition for his work.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/mccarthy_1118322.cfm) |[Generality in Artificial Intelligence](https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/1283920.1283926)| 函数式编程语言Lisp的作者<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_McCarthy_(computer_scientist)>|
|1972|Edsger Wybe Dijkstra|荷兰|编程语言|[For fundamental contributions to programming as a high, intellectual challenge; for eloquent insistence and practical demonstration that programs should be composed correctly, not just debugged into correctness; for illuminating perception of problems at the foundations of program design.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/dijkstra_1053701.cfm)|[The Humble Programmer](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/355604.361591)|博士论文：Communication with An Automatic Computer. 他曾提出“GOTO有害论”，信号量和PV原语，解决了“哲学家就餐问题” <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edsger_W._Dijkstra>|
|1973|Charles William Bachman|美国|数据库|[For his outstanding contributions to database technology.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/bachman_9385610.cfm)|[The programmer as navigator](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/355611.362534)||
|1974|Donald Ervin Knuth|美国|算法分析、程序设计语言的设计、程序设计|[For his major contributions to the analysis of algorithms and the design of programming languages, and in particular for his contributions to the "art of computer programming" through his well-known books in a continuous series by this title.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/knuth_1013846.cfm)|[Computer Programming as An Art](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/361604.361612)|博士论文：Finite Semifields and Projective Planes. The Art of Computer Programming作者，TEX作者|
|1975|||人工智能|[In joint scientific efforts extending over twenty years, initially in collaboration with J. C. Shaw at the RAND Corporation, and subsequentially with numerous faculty and student collegues at Carnegie-Mellon University, Newell and co-recipient Herbert A. Simon made basic contributions to artificial intelligence, the psychology of human cognition, and list processing.](https://amturing.acm.org/award_winners/newell_3167755.cfm)|[Computer Science as Empirical Inquiry: Symbols and Search](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/360018.360022)||
